articles.content:
Korea's reunification proposals favored 
     Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Roberto  Gabriele, general secretary of the central committee of the Italian Movement For Peace and Socialism, signed the signature paper supporting the three-point charter of Korea's reunification on June 5 on behalf of the party.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in Bulgaria 
     Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Vol. 2 of part 1 the anti-Japanese revolution of "With the Century," the reminiscences of the President Kim Il Sung, was brought out by the Narodna Tribuna Publishing House of Bulgaria on May 30.
